name: Discidium
description:
I recommend downloading the desktop version for better performance.

Discidium is a top down shooter inspired by the theme: "stronger together", made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1!!

Fight your way through this small, yet hostile world - with both your body and soul!

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow keys - Movement

P - Pause game

Space - Switch between your soul and your body

Controlling the body

Controlling the body allows you to traverse the map as you please, but you  can't attack.

LMB - Project a shield in front of you to defend from incoming projectiles

Controlling the soul

Controlling the soul allows you to attack the enemies and fly over obstacles, but you can only move near your body . 

LMB - Fire a projectile. The further from the body you are, the weaker the projectile.

TOOLS USED

Engine - Unity 2020.2.2f1

Graphics - GIMP

Sound effects - sfxr and Audacity

Music - Bosca Ceoil
